attributes.action: Move St Georges day to May or June, so we can wear a fresh rose with pride.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Th national flower for England is the rose. But we celebrate the patron saint of England, St George, well before roses are in bloom. Wouldn't it be better, not to mention greener, to celebrate St Georges day in May or June, when roses are in bloom and can be worn with pride.

rejection.details: There are several petitions already about St Georges Day...
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
